SEARCH
Package com.example.haboob

Class EventTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.haboob.EventTest
public class EventTest extends Object
Unit tests for Event that verify its in-memory behavior (no Firebase or Android dependencies).

These tests use the constructor new Event(true) to bypass Firestore initialization and focus purely on data integrity and internal list handling.

Covered behavior:

  • Constructor initialization of lists
  • Getter and setter round-trip validation for basic fields
  • Defensive copying behavior of Event.getTags()
  • Entrant list getters and setters
  • Lottery IDs persistence via constructor

Firestore-dependent methods (such as add/remove entrants) are excluded to keep this a pure JVM test.

    entrantLists_settersAndGetters_roundTrip()

    Tests that Event.getTags() returns a defensive copy.
    void
    inMemoryConstructor_initializesLists_nonNullAndEmpty()
    Ensures that constructing an Event with new Event(true) initializes all list fields (tags, entrant lists) as non-null and empty.
    void
    lotteryIds_setterViaConstructorAndGetter_roundTrip()
    Verifies that the alternate constructor Event(String, Date, Date, String, String, boolean, int, QRCode, Poster, ArrayList, ArrayList) correctly sets tags and organizer metadata.
    void
    settersAndGetters_roundTrip_basicFields()
    Verifies that all basic fields in Event (organizer, title, description, geolocation flag, sample size, dates, etc.) correctly retain values through their respective setters and getters.
